Nicomaine Dei Capili Mendoza (amuru March 3, 1995), onye amara aha ya dika Maine Mendoza, bu onye omere Filipina na agwa onyonyo
A maara ya nke ọma maka vidiyo Dubsmash viral ya na ọrụ ya dị ka Yaya Dub na ihe ngosi eziokwu ehihie rie Bulaga! ngalaba " Kalyeserye ", nke ebugoro na GMA Network na ụwa niile site na GMA Pinoy TV
A na-akọwakarị ịrị elu ya ịbụ ama ama dị ka ihe ịtụnanya na enweghị usoro n'ihi nhazi otu ịhụnanya AlDub edeghị ede na Eat Bulaga! na Julaị 16, 2015 ebe ejikọtara ya na Alden Richards
AlDub bụ Portmanteau nke aha mbụ Richards na agwa Mendoza na "Kalyeserye".
Agafee rie Bulaga!, Mendoza gosipụtara na ihe nkiri 2015 My Bebe Love: #KiligPaMore, nke ọ meriri onye na -akwado nkwado kacha mma na 41st Metro Manila Film Festival
Ọ bụ onye isi ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri 2016 Imagine You & Me, ebe o dekwara ma bụrụ abụ isiokwu ya
Mendoza nwere mmasị maka ide ihe, ebe ọ bụ onye na-ede blọgụ ọbụna tupu ya abanye ahịa ngosi
N'October 2017, o wepụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ ndụ mbụ ya akpọrọ Yup, Abụ m Nwanyị ahụ., nke bụ ụdị nke blọgụ onwe ya Pessimistic Optimist Bella na-enweghị nzacha.
A mụrụ Maine Mendoza na Maachị 3, 1995 na Santa Maria, Bulacan, Philippines    nye Mary Ann na Teodoro Mendoza
Mary Ann bụ onye na-edekọ ego nwere ọtụtụ ọdụ mmanụ ụgbọala na Bulacan ebe Teodoro bụ onye injinia na-agba mbọ na azụmaahịa na-ewu okporo ụzọ
O nwere ụmụnne abụọ na ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ
Aha niile nke ụmụnne ya na-amalitekwa na "Nico"
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị na St
Paul College of Bocaue na Bulacan
Ọ gụchara nzere bachelọ na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na ụlọ ọrụ nchịkwa isi na nkà mmụta nri na De La Salle-College of St
Benilde
O nwetara nkuzi ya na The Sagamore na Bolton Landing, New York
N'isi mmalite nke 2015, Mendoza biputere mkpokọta Dubsmash na Facebook, nke ọ ṅomiri Kris Aquino nke mere nje na otu nde nlele n'otu abalị
Nke a nwetara aha ya bụ "Queen of Dubsmash" na Philippines

N'ikpeazụ, a tụbara ya dị ka Yaya Dub (nke a makwaara dị ka Divina Ursula Bukbukova Smash  ), onye enyemaka nke Lola Nidora (nke Wally Bayola gosipụtara), na -eri Bulaga!' s "Juan For All, All For Juan" ngalaba  na nke mbụ pụtara na Julaị 4, 2015

Ejikọtara agwa ya na ngalaba ya na onye ibe ya rie Bulaga! onye na-akwado Alden Richards nke e mere na-enweghị edemede ọ bụla, na July 16, 2015, na akụkụ ihe nkiri ịhụnanya-comedy sketch nke ihe nkiri a kpọrọ " Kalyeserye" Di na nwunye a bịara mara amara dị ka AlDub, ngwakọta nke aha mbụ Richards na àgwà Mendoza na "Kalyeserye." Njikọ ha mere ka mkpughe ha sara mbara yana mmụba ọzọ nke ọkwa TV nke Eri Bulaga! Na Nọvemba 2015, Mendoza sonyeere ndị nkedo nke Princess na Obí dị ka Chef Elize, ọdịdị mbụ ya na teleserye n'ezie
Na December 2015, ọ pụtara dị ka onye ọbịa kpakpando na TV sitcom Vampire Ang Daddy Ko  na Sunday ehihie dịgasị iche iche na-egosi Sunday PinaSaya
Mendoza na Richards gbara egwu na ntinye ihe nkiri Metro Manila 2015 (MMFF) nke akpọrọ My Bebe Love #KiligPaMore yana Vic Sotto na Ai-Ai de las Alas
Jose Javier Reyes, onye nduzi nke ihe nkiri ahụ, kwadoro ntinye Mendoza na ihe nkiri ahụ
Mendoza na-egwu Anna Carillo, nwa isi ike na onye nnupụisi nke àgwà Vic Sotto
Enyere ya ihe nrite onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kacha mma site n'aka MMFF maka ọrụ ya
Na Disemba 2015, ha pụtara na azụmahịa ID ọdụ GMA Network maka ekeresimesi
N'agbanyeghị na ọ pụtara na GMA, ọ bụghị onye so na GMA Artist Center na ọrụ ya na-achịkwa Triple A, ogwe aka njikwa talent nke Antonio P
Tuviera bụ onye na-emepụta ihe na-emepụta ihe na -eri Bulaga!
Mendoza sonyeere na ihe nkiri oge Lenten nke iri Bulaga! na Maachị 2016

Ọ kwughachiri ọrụ ya dị ka Divina/Yaya Dub na Kaputol ng Buhay wee mee ihe nkiri dị ka Dani na Chukwu nyere m gị ebe ọ nwetara ihe nrite Darling of the Screen wee họpụta ya maka Performance Most Dramatic Performance site n'aka onye ndu kpakpando na eri Bulaga!' s 3rd EB Dabarkads Awards emere na Eprel 2, 2016
Mendoza na Richards gbara n'ihe nkiri Imagine You & Me dị ka ndị na-eme ihe nkiri
A gbara ụfọdụ ihe nkiri ihe nkiri ahụ na Como, Italy

N'afọ 2017, Mendoza na Richards gbara egwu na usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn mbụ ha Kaara ịbụ nke Gị  ebe Mendoza rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Sinag Obispo, redio DJ na mmasị ịhụnanya nke Benjie Rosales onye bụ onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ Richards rụrụ
N'October 2017, Mendoza na Richards gbara isi n'isi na Eat Bulaga! emepụtara ihe nkiri onyonyo nke akpọrọ Ịhụnanya bụ
ya na Adolf Alix Jr dịka onye isi
Kemgbe Disemba 2017, Mendoza na-apụtakarị na-arụ ọrụ ndị ọbịa dị iche iche na Daig Kayo ng Lola Ko
Mendoza na Richards emeela ọtụtụ nkwado ngwaahịa ebe Mendoza pụtakwara n'ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi n'onwe ya
Ọ pụtara dị ka nwa agbọghọ mkpuchi maka akwụkwọ akụkọ Meg na Preview maka Nọvemba 2015
Mendoza na ihe nkedo nke " Kalyeserye " ka e gosiri na EE! mbipụta nke November 2015
Mendoza na Richards pụtara na mkpuchi nke Reader's Digest Asia,  mbipụta pụrụ iche nke EE! magazin,  na Inside Showbiz  na PeopleAsia  na Disemba 2015
E wezụga ịbụ na mkpuchi nke PeopleAsia, Mendoza ọnụ na Richards natara ndị mmadụ nke Year award na 2016 si na magazin
N'ịkwado ịrụ ọrụ Mendoza dị ka onye na-akwado ngwaahịa, ọ ghọrọ Trinitian Awardee maka nkwado mgbasa ozi nwanyị kachasị bara uru n'oge Platinum Stallion Awards (Awards for Advertising) na 2016
Mendoza na Richards nọ na mkpuchi ọzọ nke Jenụwarị 2016 nke EE! magazin
N'otu ọnwa ahụ, di na nwunye ahụ bụ ndị mbụ showbiz ndị mmadụ rutere na mkpuchi nke BizNews Asia
Na kalenda 2016 nke Disney Channel Asia, Mendoza pụtara dị ka Elsa site na ihe nkiri Disney Frozen
Mendoza pụtara na mbipụta February 2016 nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Cosmopolitan na Richards  na Esquire Philippines na Jose Manalo, Wally Bayola na Paolo Ballesteros
Na July 2016, Mendoza ya na Richards pụtara na mkpuchi nke EE! magazin nke ugboro atọ wee duru ndepụta magazin nke Kasị Mma Stars nke 2016
N'otu ọnwa ahụ, Mendoza rutere na ọkwa 21st nke FHM Philippines ' 100 Sexiest Women maka 2016 dị ka ntinye ọhụrụ  mgbe na July 2017, ọ rịgoro n'ogo ole na ole dị elu wee bụrụ nwanyị nke 9th sexiest
Maka ncheta 25th ya, Mega Magazine kpọrọ Mendoza dị ka otu n'ime "ụmụ nwanyị akara ngosi 25" nke Philippines na ọ bụ otu n'ime mkpuchi 25 dị iche iche nke akwụkwọ ha siri ike Mega Akụkọ
E gosikwara ya n'ihu akwụkwọ akụkọ Cosmopolitan Philippines pụrụ iche nke afọ 20
Dị ka Soltero Salazar nke Association of Philippine Advertisers si kwuo na June 2017, Mendoza karịrị Kris Aquino dị ka onye na-akwado ndị ama ama na Philippines
Soltero gbakwụnyere na Aquino abụrụla onye nkwado kacha elu kemgbe 1990 mana mgbe ọ hapụrụ ABS-CBN na 2017 na-eme ka a naghị ahụ ya na telivishọn, ndị mgbasa ozi họọrọ Mendoza kama
Site na nkwado ngwaahịa 30 na 2016, Mendoza ghọrọ onye nkwado kacha elu n'ihi ewu ewu ya na onyonyo mara mma

Mendoza nọ na-edebe blọgụ nkeonwe, Pessimistic Optimist Bella, kemgbe 2012 wee kpughee n'April 2017 na ọ na-eme atụmatụ ịhapụ akwụkwọ na njedebe nke 2017 na blọọgụ ya bụ otu n'ime mkpali ya na-ede akwụkwọ
Dị ka ya si kwuo, akwụkwọ ahụ, nke ga-elekwasị anya na ndụ onwe ya, agaghị enwe ndị na- ede akwụkwọ mmụọ ka ọ ga-ede akwụkwọ n'onwe ya
N'October 2017, akwụkwọ akụkọ ndụ mbụ ya akpọrọ Yup, I Am That Girl bụ Summit Media   bipụtara wee malite na Ọktoba 26, 2017
Aha akwụkwọ ahụ dabere na bio akaụntụ Twitter ya  yana dịka nkọwa ya dị mkpirikpi si dị, ụdị blọọgụ nke ya enweghị nzacha
Mgbe ekwuwapụtachara akwụkwọ mmalite ahụ, #YupIAmThatGirl na-ewu ewu na Twitter  na ndị ode akwụkwọ Lang Leav na Michael Faudet meghachiri omume nke ọma na akwụkwọ Mendoza
E rerela akwụkwọ ya n'ime naanị awa anọ ka otu ụlọ ahịa akwụkwọ kwuputara na ọ dị
Mendoza tinyere aka n'ahịa nri ngwa ngwa mgbe ọ zụtara aha aha ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ America McDonald's, nke ọ kwadoro
Ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ ya meghere na August 11, 2017 n'obodo ya, Barangay Sta
Clara, Santa Maria, Bulacan
A na-ekwu kpọmkwem ebe azụmahịa ya dị na nso ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ ụgbọala nke ezinụlọ ya

N'ịbụ onye Philippines kacha googled agwa na 2015   na ọtụtụ tweeted Filipino celebrity na ụwa na 2017,  Mendoza a na-ewere na nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu na ịntanetị na mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta dịka ndị otu na-enye onyinye ghọtara.,   na-enweta aha ya dị ka Social Media Queen
Akpọrọkwa ya aha dị ka Kpakpando Phenomenal
N'October 2015, akaụntụ Mendoza Twitter ghọrọ profaịlụ nke na-eto ngwa ngwa nke atọ, ndị na-eso ụzọ ya mụbara ruo 1,094,813 n'ime naanị ọnwa ole na ole
N'ihi ewu ewu ya, e mebiri akaụntụ mgbasa ozi ya ugboro abụọ
Otu n'ime mbanye anataghị ikike ahụ mere na Nọvemba 2015 ebe otu ndị omekome weghaara Twitter ya bụ ndị kọwara onwe ha dị ka Anonymous Philippines
Ha biputere usoro tweet na-akwalite Million Mask March
N'agbanyeghị na ha wakporo akaụntụ ahụ, ha kwere nkwa na ha ga-eweghachi ya onye nwe ya
N'ihe na-erughị awa 24, Mendoza nwere ike ijide akaụntụ mgbasa ozi ọha ya
Mgbe usoro tweet na-agwa ndị Fans ka ha ghara ịhapụ ozi ịkpọasị, Mendoza kwụsịrị akaụntụ Twitter ya na June 2017;  akaụntụ mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta ya ndị ọzọ ka na-arụ ọrụ
Na October 22, 2017, ọ megharịrị Twitter ya
E gosipụtara Mendoza n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ akụkọ telivishọn na ihe ngosi okwu na GMA Network gụnyere Kapuso Mo, Jessica Soho,   CelebriTV,  na N'abalị a na Arnold Clavio
Rico Hizon gbara Mendoza ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Richards maka akụkọ BBC pụrụ iche

Ọ pụtakwara na Lip Sync Battle Philippines site na ihe ndekọ vidiyo n'oge ihe ngosi nke anọ nke ihe nkiri ahụ na March 2016 ebe o nyere ndụmọdụ-syncing egbugbere ọnụ Alden Richards bụ onye ọbịa nke ngosi ahụ

Onye na-eme ihe nkiri pụtara na usoro vignettes na-akọwa ihe ị ga-eme na ịghara ime na 2016 Philippine nhoputa ndi ochichi,  dị ka akụkụ nke GMA News na Public Affairs mkpuchi nke ntuli aka nke a na-akpọ Eleksyon 2016
N'October 2016, e kpughere na Mendoza nwere ọrụ cameo na fim Enteng Kabisote 10 na Abangers

Na December 2015, Mendoza nwetara kpakpando na Philippine Walk of Fame na Eastwood City, Libis, Quezon City tinyere ya " Kalyeserye " co-stars  na aha ya bụ ọkacha mmasị Young Actress na 5th OFW Gawad Parangal
E nyekwara Mendoza akara Makabatang Alagad ng Telebisyon (Onye na-eme enyi enyi na Television) site n'aka Anak TV na February 2016
Mendoza nwetakwara ọtụtụ ihe nrite na Nuffnang Philippines Bloggers Awards
Ọ merikwara nwanyị TV Star nke afọ na nwanyị Breakout Star of the Year maka 2016 na PEPList Awards Year 3 nke Philippine Entertainment Portal

Aside from being given accolades for her performance as an artist, as a citizen in the Philippines, the Philippine Bureau of Internal Revenue at the regional district office in Caloocan acknowledged Mendoza in August 2017 as the top individual regional tax payer.  As alumni of a De La Salle educational institution, Mendoza was given recognition during the 1st Gawad Lasallianeta in September 2017 upon receiving the Zeal for Lasallian Excellence as Media Communicators award.  In December 2017, Mendoza received another Anak TV award, the Female Makabata Star award.
